items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #354 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

This week there are some great resources for getting started with .NET MAUI and as always so many great videos to help you develop MAUI Apps.

Have a great week developing apps!

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #354 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

This week there are some great resources for getting started with .NET MAUI and as always so many great videos to help you develop MAUI Apps.

Have a great week developing apps!

Kym

items.title: Maui Fest 2022 Videos
items.description:
MauiFest 2022 is a free online community event to celebrate the launch of .NET MAUI. This is a link to the full stream which covered MAUI Blazor, Platform code in MAUI, Customizing Controls, Integrating AD B2C and Prism.

Maui Fest 2022 Videos by Javier Suárez
items.description_markdown:
MauiFest 2022 is a free online community event to celebrate the launch of .NET MAUI. This is a link to the full stream which covered MAUI Blazor, Platform code in MAUI, Customizing Controls, Integrating AD B2C and Prism.

[**Maui Fest 2022 Videos**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UOBOsBbmmTw) by [Javier Suárez](https://javiersuarezruiz.wordpress.com)

items.title: Debug Android Apps with WSA and Visual Studio 2022
items.description:
James is joined by Jonathan Dick, Engineering Lead for .NET MAUI, who talks about his new extension for Visual Studio 2022 that will automatically configure and connect to WSA, the Windows Subsystem for Android. This extension will automatically install, configure, and connect Visual Studio in seconds!

Debug Android Apps with WSA and Visual Studio 2022 by dotNet Youtube Channel
items.description_markdown:
James is joined by Jonathan Dick, Engineering Lead for .NET MAUI, who talks about his new extension for Visual Studio 2022 that will automatically configure and connect to WSA, the Windows Subsystem for Android. This extension will automatically install, configure, and connect Visual Studio in seconds!

[**Debug Android Apps with WSA and Visual Studio 2022**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ABua3pB3RGc) by [dotNet Youtube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/ucvtt19mzw8dq5wwfu6b0oxw)

embedded_links.title: **Debug Android Apps with WSA and Visual Studio 2022**

items.title: Working with .NET MAUI Styles - .NET MAUI 101
items.description:
With Styles you can easily style your whole .NET MAUI app. In this video you will learn about implicit styles, explicit styles and how to apply styles to just one page or your whole application!

Working with .NET MAUI Styles - .NET MAUI 101 by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
With Styles you can easily style your whole .NET MAUI app. In this video you will learn about implicit styles, explicit styles and how to apply styles to just one page or your whole application!

[**Working with .NET MAUI Styles - .NET MAUI 101**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tcat1scCxVs) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: Light & Dark Mode with AppThemeBinding
items.description:
Whether you're on team light theme or team dark mode, as a developer you're going to have to support both. Luckily, with .NET MAUI implementing support for both is a breeze! Using the AppThemeBinding you can easily specify values to use for light- and dark theme for any type of object!

Light & Dark Mode with AppThemeBinding by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Whether you're on team light theme or team dark mode, as a developer you're going to have to support both. Luckily, with .NET MAUI implementing support for both is a breeze! Using the AppThemeBinding you can easily specify values to use for light- and dark theme for any type of object!

[**Light & Dark Mode with AppThemeBinding**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mao-oXFua5g) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)
